runs.comm: What.A.Start to both the innings by Afghanistan! If it was the first ball six while batting, then the middle stump of Porterfield is uprooted by an yorker. Will Ireland recover and try to trade punches through these 20 overs now?
fuller ball outside the off stump. Joyce looks to chase it and is beaten by the movement
on the leg stump. Joyce looks to flick it and gets hit on the pad. The ball runs down to fine-leg for four leg-byes as Shahzad was at least a couple of seconds late in diving
comes forward and drives it to cover
fuller ball outside the off stump. Joyce comes forward and defends it to the cover fielder
short ball on the leg stump. Joyce moves across and does his best impersonation of Lara as he lifts his frontfoot and pulls it behind square for a boundary. Eventful over this.
The Powerplay overs are seeming like they are straight out of highlights package. Ashraf errs in bowling a half-volley. Stirling gets his front-foot forward and drives it past covers for a boundary
how simple is this? You can't do that with such ease in a video game. Striling moves across and flicks it over square-leg for a boundary that had dominance written all over it
short ball outside the off stump. Stirling comes down the track and clears the infield on the off side with a lofted drive and makes it three in three. Ashraf under pressure now
comes forward and drives it past midwicket for three runs
wide down the leg side. Ashraf is conceding the advantage of early wicket with his bowling
fuller ball on the middle stump. Joyce comes forward and pushes it to the leg side
fuller ball outside the off stump. Joyce comes forward and opens the face of the bat as he pushes it to point and gets a single to retain the strike
meanwhile, Zadran looks like he is operating on a different pitch altogether. He goes round the wicket and beats the outside edge of the bat with a ball coming in
how much of a tease is this? Zadran entices Joyce into the drive and beats him with the inward movement. Real contest on the cards when Zadran is bowling
make it three in a row as Joyce looks to go for the lofted drive and is beaten by the movement in
pushes it to mid-on for a single
fuller ball on the leg stump. Stirling chips it and the ball just falls short of the fielder at mid-on
tests him out with a short ball. The umpire, surprisingly, signals it as a wide and Zadran has a smile at the end of his follow-through
on the leg stump. Joyce turns it to deep square-leg for a single

we have seen some good shots in this match but none can beat this for the delight it provided. Fuller ball way outside the off stump. Joyce leans and threads it past the cover fielder for the shot of the day
fuller ball outside the off stump. Joyce comes forward and drives it back to the bowler, who is late in reacting in stretching his hand
comes forward and pushes it to point

fuller ball on the leg stump. Joyce flicks it all the way into the hands of Nabi at deep square-leg. Alam endures a few anxious moments before punching the air in celebration of the wicket. The crowd seems to have found its voice back
struck on the pads on the leg stump and would have maintained the line. Good decision by the umpire
short ball outside the off stump. Stirling makes room and smashes it past the diving fielder at deep midwicket for a boundary. Needless to say, Ireland's hopes hinge on how long Stirling bats

off the pads to third-man for a leg-bye. Shahzad and Dawlatzai were angered by the turning down of the appeal. On replays it seemed as if the ball would have hit the top of the off stump. Rub of the green for Ireland then

fuller ball on the off stump. Stirling drives it back past the bowler for a boundary, his fifth. There was a lot of power in the shot as by the time Dawlatzai stretched his arm, the ball was past the mid-off fielder
pulls it to deep midwicket for a couple
fuller ball outside the off stump. Stirling makes room and slices it over the infield on the off side for his sixth boundary
cuts it to cover
now the wrists are bought into play. He waits for the ball till the last moment and with the last moment tweak of the wrists, sends the ball sailing over third-man for a six
short ball outside off. Wilson looks to cut and is beaten. Shahzad thinks it was edge and is disappointed that the umpire doesn't think so
cuts it to point
pushes it to mid-on for a single
full-toss on the leg stump. Stirling sweeps it to fine-leg for a boundary
pushes this one faster as Stirling blasts it past cover for a couple
short ball outside the off stump. Striling is well into position as the ball is bowled. He picks the length early and sends the ball seven rows back over the midwicket fence. Superb shot that
pushes it to the leg side and gets to his half-century. Apparently the second fastest in T20 history
comes forward and defends it to the off side
full-toss outside the off stump. Wilson comes forward and drives it to sweeper cover for a single
wide down the leg side and they  take a run as Shahzad parries the ball to short fine-leg fielder
outside the off stump and left alone by Wilson

fuller ball on the middle and leg line. Wilson comes forward and drives it to long-on. The extra couple of seconds that the fielder took in fielding the ball proved handy for them as they take a couple
Nabi bowls a short ball first up. Stirling stands tall and bludgeons it past the cover fielder for a boundary
comes forward and defends it to the off side
on the leg stump. Stirling turns it to the leg side for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. Wilson guides it to short third-man for a single
fuller ball on the leg stump. Stirling flicks it to deep midwicket and gets a couple more added to his and the teams tally
comes forward and defends it to the off side
fuller ball outside the off stump. Wilson comes forward and drives it to the cover fielder
plays it with soft hands to point
comes down the track and pushes it to the leg side for a single
fuller ball on the off stump. Stirling slogs it to cow corner for a single
off the pads to short fine-leg fielder for a leg-bye
fuller ball outside the off stump. Stirling drives it to long-off for a single
fuller ball on the middle stump. Stirling comes down the track and slogs it to deep square-leg for a single
reverse-sweeps and gets a bottom edge to square-leg for a single
dropped! He lofts it to long-off and the fielder doesn't time the forward dive properly as the catch is spilled
steers it to third-man for a couple
cut to deep point for a single
looks to reverse sweep and gets a top edge. The fielder at short fine-leg comes running in and lets the throw rip. The batsman is just in as the bowler whips the bails off
turns it to the leg side for a single
makes room and drives it to cover for a single
cuts it to point
fuller ball on the leg stump. Wilson comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler
comes down the track and pushes it to long-on for a single
short on the middle stump. Stirling pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
drives it back to the bowler. The bowler throws it back onto the stumps. Wilson had his bat entrenched in the crease
this man has a lot more left in him. He comes down the track and lofts it over long-on for his third six and looks good for many more
comes down the track and sweeps it to square-leg
fuller ball outside the off stump. Wilson coems down the track and lofts it to long-off. The throw was razor sharp but Shahzad failed to collect it and Wilson gets away
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
Fuller ball on the off stump. Stirling launches it back over the bowler's head for his ninth boundary
yorker on the off stump. Stirling drives it to long-off for a single
fuller ball on the leg stump. Wilson pushes it to midwicket and hands the strike back to Stirling
slower ball outside the off stump. Stirling is slow in picking it and cuts it with no timing to point

and finally, the wicket that Afghanistan needed! Short ball outside the off stump. Stirling gets into the position early and pulls it. Naib times the jump perfectly and pulls off a stunner. Each of the Afghan bowlers seem to have a trademark celebration as Zadran thumps his chest

well its two in two now. O'Brien looks to run it down and gets an outside edge. Shahzad saves his most athletic moment of the day for this catch. he dives to his right and pulls off a stunner. Second time in two two balls that I have used the expression. Can he get a hattrick of the first ball, next over?
comes forward and defends it to mid-off
short ball on the leg stump. Wilson rocks back and pulls it to deep square-leg for a boundary
comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
looks to duck under the short ball and is hit on the helmet. The fielder at midwicket ran as if it was a catch. There is a sudden spring in the step of the fielders now
comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
short ball outside the off stump. Poynter looks to cut it and the away movement beats him comprehensively
short ball outside the off stump. Wilson moved across and looked to upper cut it. He decides against it and withdraws. No hattrick, then
pushes it to mid-on for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. Poynter made room and lofted it over extra-cover for a boundary. Audacious shot under the circumstances
comes forward and pushes it to cover
slower ball down the leg side. Poynter forces it to short fine-leg for a single
full-toss on the leg stump. Wilson pushes it to long-on and retains the strike with a single
comes forward and defends it to the off side
short ball outside the off stump. Wilson waits for thr ball and runs it past the diving third-man fielder for a boundary.
fuller ball outside the off stump. Wilson comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
Poynter is making room as the ball is being bowled. The bowler notices it and pitches it short. Poynter under edges the pull shot

short ball outside the off stump. Poynter moves back and hits it like a double handed forehand. Just that it would have sailed into the adjacent courts if it was tennis played on centre court. This is cricket and he gets a six for his efforts
pushes it to mid-off for a single
pushes it to midwicket and sets off for a quick single. The throw hits the knee of the umpire and they take an extra run for the overthrow
cuts it to deep point for a couple
fuller ball on the middle stump. Poynter looks to slog it and gets an inside edge to short fine-leg for a single
short ball outside the off stump. Wilson rocks back and cuts it past the point fielder for a couple

fuller ball outside the off stump. Wilson is running towards the danger end and the bowler swings his arm back as Wilson is approaching the crease. Wilson has a go at the bowler and also at Shahzad, who for some strange reason gets involved
pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple
comes forward and defends it to the off side
turns it to midwicket
flicks it to the deep midwicket fielder for a single
turns it to square-leg for a single
fuller ball on the leg stump. Wilson rolls his wrists as he pushes it to short fine-leg and takes a quick single

fuller ball outside the off stump. Wilson lofts it straight into the hands of the fielder at long-off, Mirwais. And the tension boils over as Aftab speaks whats on his mind and Wilson responds but then better sense prevailed and both of them stopped brawling
pushes it to square-leg for a single
flicks it to deep midwicket for a single
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller ball on the leg stump. Poynter flicks it past the midwicket fielder and does a Shahid Afridi in celebrating with the arms aloft. Ireland win the game by 5 wickets
